contentrichtext.text: {{Infobox lake | lake_name = Yueya Lake | image_lake = | caption_lake = | image_bathymetry = | caption_bathymetry = | location = [[Nanjing]], [[Jiangsu]] | coords = {{coord|32.030|118.822|type:waterbody|display=inline,title}} | type = | inflow = | outflow = | catchment = | basin_countries = China | length = | width = | area = | depth = | max-depth = | volume = | residence_time = | shore = | elevation = | islands = | cities = | frozen = }} '''Yueya Lake''' ([[Chinese character|Chinese]]: 月牙湖; [[Pinyin]]: Yuèyá Hú; literally meaning ''Crescent Moon Lake'')<ref>[http://www.xjdht.com/english/ReadNews.asp?NewsID=22&BigClassID=2&SmallClassID=4 Welcome To China travel agency the tour net] at xjdht.com</ref> is a [[lake]] near [[Nanjing]]. <br clear=all> ==References== {{reflist}} *[http://www.njbx.gov.cn/webpage/english/inner.jsp?funcId=18977&detailId=31007 Welcome to Baixia,Nanjing] at njbx.gov.cn {{Lakes of China}} [[Category:Lakes of Jiangsu]] {{Jiangsu-geo-stub}}
